original_text: Joseph had a dream, and when he told it to his brothers, they hated him all the more.
korean_text: 요셉이 꿈을 꾸고 자기 형들에게 말하매 그들이 그를 더욱 미워하였더라

sentences.original_text: and when he told it to his brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그것을 형들에게 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: they hated him all the more
